lead_paragraph: TBS announced yesterday that Ron Darling and Buck Martinez would be the analysts for its first season of Sunday afternoon broadcasts that are to begin on April 6 with Boston playing Toronto. Each will work separately with Chip Caray, the play-by-play announcer, and Darling’s appearances will not conflict with his schedule as a Mets game and studio analyst for SportsNet New York.
